text: Marco Michael Andretti (born March 13, 1987) is an American race car driver. He drives car #27 for Andretti Autosport in the IndyCar Series. He is a part of the famous Andretti family of race car drivers. Andretti began racing in the IndyCar Series in 2006. His best season was 2013 at 5th place. he has had 2 wins. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official page Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American racecar drivers Category:IndyCar Series drivers
title: Marco Andretti
